member.name: F:CrawfisSoftware.Tiling.PathTile.Straight0101
member.summary: A vertical path tile in a straight line. Numbering goes left,top,right,bottom

member.name: F:CrawfisSoftware.Tiling.PathTile.Straight1010
member.summary: A horizontal path tile in a straight line. Numbering goes left,top,right,bottom

member.name: F:CrawfisSoftware.Tiling.PathTile.Circle0011
member.summary: Path tile that turns from right edge to bottom edge in an arc. Numbering goes left,top,right,bottom

member.name: F:CrawfisSoftware.Tiling.PathTile.Circle0110
member.summary: Path tile that turns from top edge to right edge in an arc. Numbering goes left,top,right,bottom

member.name: F:CrawfisSoftware.Tiling.PathTile.Circle1001
member.summary: Path tile that turns from left edge to bottom edge in an arc. Numbering goes left,top,right,bottom

member.name: F:CrawfisSoftware.Tiling.PathTile.Circle1100
member.summary: Path tile that turns from left edge to top edge in an arc. Numbering goes left,top,right,bottom

member.name: F:CrawfisSoftware.Tiling.PathTile.Manhattan0011
member.summary: Path tile that turns from right edge to bottom edge along axes. Numbering goes left,top,right,bottom

member.name: F:CrawfisSoftware.Tiling.PathTile.Manhattan0110
member.summary: Path tile that turns from top edge to right edge along axes. Numbering goes left,top,right,bottom

member.name: F:CrawfisSoftware.Tiling.PathTile.Manhattan1001
member.summary: Path tile that turns from left edge to bottom edge along axes. Numbering goes left,top,right,bottom

member.name: F:CrawfisSoftware.Tiling.PathTile.Manhattan1100
member.summary: Path tile that turns from left edge to bottom top along axes. Numbering goes left,top,right,bottom
